subject: Re: help-I broke my box
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Can it be soldered?  Where does it break at?  Good to know, as I am 
perfomring an operation in the next day or so on mine. - LC

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Frank Sumption" <franks-boxes@...> 
wrote:
>
> Everytime I open the '470 the battery wire breaks off. 
> 
>  Frank
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Ron Lederer <ronriko@> wrote:
> >
> > So dummy here couldn't even follow Mike's great video 
instructions 
> with the RS12-469.  After driving two hours to Merida, Mexico and 
> then back and putting down 600 pesos (about $55 dollars) it took me 
> ten minutes to do everything UFO Geek laid out in his video for 
> hacking the radio shack box.  Cut the right pin labeled mute.  
Closed 
> the box nicely.  Nothing.  Reopened the box...looked around...two 
> times more...still nothing.   Not even a light or hum.  
> >    
> >   Until I figure the radio thing out, I am in the mean time 
getting 
> nowhere (it seems) with the EVP Maker on my computer to generate 
EVP 
> noise and using my hand recorder etc.   Wish I could try the radio 
> sistem...any real geeks who can give technical suggestions would be 
> greatly appreciated.  Or maybe I should just throw away my 469 and 
> start over.   Dont think RS will take it back.     geek-wanna-be, 
Ron
